description: This file contains declarations of functions, constants, and macros related to the CcspHotspot module, specifically for managing SSID entries and associated device information within a Cisco Hotspot implementation. It includes function prototypes for retrieving entry counts, obtaining specific entries, and handling parameter values related to the hotspot's SSID and associated devices.
external_methods: cosa_apis.h: (not explicitly listed, but implied functions for API management)
plugin_main_apis.h: (not explicitly listed, but implied functions for main plugin APIs)

methods.name: HsSsid_GetEntryCount
methods.description: Returns the number of SSID entries present.

methods.name: HsSsid_GetEntry
methods.description: Retrieves a specific SSID entry by index, providing an instance number.

methods.name: HsSsid_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Fetches a string parameter value for a given SSID entry.

methods.name: HsAssoDev_GetEntryCount
methods.description: Returns the number of associated device entries.

methods.name: HsAssoDev_GetEntry
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific associated device by index.

methods.name: HsAssoDev_IsUpdated
methods.description: Checks if the associated device data has been updated.

methods.name: HsAssoDev_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for an associated device.

methods.name: HsAssoDev_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for an associated device.

calls: cosa_apis.h: functions related to accessing and managing Cosa APIs
plugin_main_apis.h: functions related to plugin management interfaces
